title: "PvP.net patch kernel not responding". "RADS error. Could not connect to the http server".
body: My friend and I are in Fairbanks Alaska and both have the same internet provider. when we try to open the game through the desktop icon it says, "PvP.net patch kernel not responding". "RADS error. Could not connect to the http server". We are in different parts of town and can access any other site or game we have. Is there possibly a local issue with our service provider or is Riot struggling with AK? Thoughts and or Fix suggestions? I checked out what other users had done to correct their issues when approached with the same connectivity problems and none of them worked. I didn't see any other local posts about this. So in full scope any computer in my household gets the aforementioned quotes and my friends computer.

replies.body: My husband and I are in North Pole, AK and we are having the same problem. I don't believe it's us, it's the servers themselves, or at least something on Riot's end. Are you at Zeek's by chance? lol
No we haven't gotten that desperate haha. If your service provider ACS? both my friend and I go through them.
I can't remember for sure, it's the blue modem with the blue circles on it. I'm thinking about heading up to Zeek's and checking it out there..

Hey everyone,

Please follow the steps provided in this Riot Games Player Support article:
I have Windows 7.
For Windows 7:
thank you so much! it worked great.
okay, that would explain why the video clip we saw showed them using the same thing in Europe. Before I start digging around with this i'll see if we can conjure anything up locally. Much thanks.
That might be a good idea. If anything he may have a good idea of what to do about it. Please do share if you decide to take that avenue! I think the blue circle is for ACS.
I will. I'm trying that post below with the picture right now. I was able to figure it out for Windows 7, so we'll see what happens. Maybe I could just call Zeek and ask if league is working there.
Me and my brother are having the same issue and yeah we goth through ACS as well.  Hello fellow Alaskans :)
As soon as I get into League, all these alaskan's are getting friend requests lol
sounds good!
Do that thing in the picture.
Did it work for you?
did you ever figure it out man?
Yeah, I'm on League right now! Thank goodness lol
Did you guys try it yet? Just wondering if anything went through on your ends.
it worked for me too, sent you a request.
Posted this three days ago and got no help so thx

same problem..
ISP: telstra
OS: windows 7

support.riotgames.com doesnt work either
http://l3cdn.riotgames.com doesnt work either
are you in the Fairbanks area as well?

guys, only time and luck can heal the pvp.
I have RADS error on Sat, i tried every method on web and the problem cannot be solved. 
However, I gave up and did nothing for a day. The RADS error disappeared when I tried to click the PvP logo at the desktop.

After the RADS error disappeared, I still cannot log in to play games as the server does not have any response at all.
I tried to set google (8.8.8.8) as DNS and flush the dns in CMD for thousands of time. The problem still exist.

Now, I gave up to flush DNS again for 3-4 hours and I did nothing to solve that. When I click the pvp a few minutes ago, I can suddenly log in to pvp to play games.

So, just be patient and time as well as luck can heal pvp .....
I tried changing the dns and flushing and I'm up and working.  I live in Fairbanks and use ACS.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Bx4urHlu-i-keep-trying-to-open-up-league-but-i-keep-getting-this-message?comment=006a0002
here this might help got to the bottom of the page and there is a video follow it step by step
it helped me
im nervous to try a fix like this as the player is in europe.

well im in America and it worked for me
just saying
and if nothing works you might try it

I live in Juneau, AK and I was having the same issue earlier. I'm on a Mac, and I uninstalled League and tried reinstalling it. But now when I go to download it, it gives me the error page. Any info or suggestions to help a fellow Alaska LoL player to help me reinstall? D:
